website_summaries.verdict: Beyond receiving all of the components you need to practice sutures, kit includes an e-book.
pros: 4 different kinds of sutures are included inside this kit, ensuring you always have the right materials on hand for practice
Multiple tools included for the most realistic practice sessions
E-book is very helpful for those just learning suturing techniques
cons: Overall quality of the kit's components could be a little better

customer_reviews.title: Unboxing Product/Contents Review
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything and more. The quality of the “skin” is great and the intruments are very high quality. The leather, zipper carrying case fits the skin and instruments with no problem which makes it easy to travel with. The added ebook for us beginners who have never sutured before is such a great touch. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Wereszczak

customer_reviews.title: As a surgical technologist
customer_reviews.text: I found this is be a good basic way to start, practicing to suture. Although I would recommend working with 2-0 silks , 3-0 vicryl or mostly 3 or 4 -0 monocryl. I would work on the basics with the gel pad and perhaps try on a banana due to its thick skin. As for ththe instruments, they're not no OR german stainless steel. But they work for ththe most part. Just wish the mayo scissors were better and the kit had a adsin added to it. I over all recommend it to beginners
customer_reviews.author: Arron Centeno

customer_reviews.title: Must Have -FNP Students!!
customer_reviews.text: *I labeled the medical equipment in the suture tray for my own learning - the equipment comes UNLABELED. This kit is PERFECT and came very well organized. I am in FNP school and I needed this to practice. It is as pictured. I love the videos and educational material. A++++++++++++ I will update with a picture of my suturing and how I felt the material was while suturing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality board
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality board! The “tissue” on this thing can’t hold tension worth a damn before the sutures rip through. Completely useless for any stitch other than simple interrupted or simple running. I am returning it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brumer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Practice
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pre-med student and I find this suture kit to be really helpful. It's true that this is not exactly like human skin, but it'll give you a very good sense of how to suture. Everything looks professional and in addition to the videos and pdf book that comes with the kit, there is a lot of suturing videos on youtube you can use to practice. Actually, you can use a Youtuber promo code to get a discount.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Avila-Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: I am sharing this
customer_reviews.text: Where I work I shared with a ER nurse and sharing this with a Doctor to teach others in the education dept . This is the best way to learn to suture for ER Techs Nurse Techs and Nursing students and doctors This suture set is very very nice I learned how to do it very easily I highly recommend . This set has a very nice leather case that you can carry anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: neeceeg

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an FNP student and currently precepting at a urgent care center. I definitely want to take advantage of the practice there and decide to buy this kit to practice. I look through several kits and their reviews and decided to go with this kit. The pad is made of good practice silicone material, pretty close to flesh like. It includes several types of sutures to practice with and everything you need to practice, all in one compact kit. I would recommend this kit for anyone looking to practice and improve on their skills.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Quality Suture Kit
customer_reviews.text: This suture kit has all the basic needs to practice various skills. The instruments are of very good quality and it comes with a variety of sutures. The pad is holding up nicely. I have purchased a second one for my medical student friend. I found a number of tutorials on you tube to compliment this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Suture kit! Happy with the suture pad 😃
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than I expected! I should've bought this a long time ago. The silicone pad is really high quality and does not rip. I am enjoying practicing and learning how to suture. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Murad Nofal

customer_reviews.title: Top notch suture kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing high quality product! I received my package much quicker than planned. The suture pad abd instruments are of wonderful quality making brushing up my suture skills very easy to get back into. It even comes with a free downloadable eBook (with purchase of kit) that is very detailed and helpful! Highly recommend to aspiring medical students weather it be in the human or animal field. This business is also very quick to respond if there are any questions and are answered with the upmost sencerity. I absolutely love my A+ Medics suture kit!
customer_reviews.author: wesley knevelbaard

customer_reviews.title: Skin-like suture pad
customer_reviews.text: The DVD is very helpful, but the suture pad is most helpful. I prefer using this suture pad over a real pigs foot ;) I Highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Great Educational Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to use when beginning to learn how to suture. I bought it to practice since the program I am in has a limited time frame for instruction. I only wish the book was in print. Otherwise it's a great educational tool! They also have great costumer service. They checked to see when I recieved my kit and how was I was liking. I was first introduced to the kit through Instagram and am glad I purchased the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, good quality kit
customer_reviews.text: I got my A+ Medics Suture kit in order to practice for an academic future and career in medicine. The kit is definitely very good for beginners like me. The tools are good quality and sturdy. I will say that the mat is definitely fragile to rips over use, however it does mimic human skin and works very well for practice with the sutures. The e-book and videos are also very helpful. Overall, a great experience and product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaya

customer_reviews.title: Memorable gift for Pre-Med Student
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my son who is a pre-Med student. He’s having a blast watching the video and learning to suture. He’s already offered to stitch me up should the need ever arise. Thanks for a such a wonderful, educational gift for my boy.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Good product, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: As a dental student looking for practice with suturing, I really liked this product! They have suture types to practice with and a detailed step-by-step booklet & video resources in their customer portal. The only qualm was that I found the blade to be difficult to take on and off the scalpel, but this was just a very minor inconvenience. Also, you can expect very friendly and super fast customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kishore Nadella

customer_reviews.title: great to learn on
customer_reviews.text: I am been practicing on my down time at work. highly recommend. The videos are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie strothkamp

customer_reviews.title: Best suture kit out there!
customer_reviews.text: I love my suture kit from A+ Medics! The quality is amazing, it comes with a perfect storage zip up which makes it super transportable, and comes with a good amount of suture. I will definitely be purchasing more kits in the future - for myself and to gift to my other premed and med student friends! If you want to practice your sutures (esp. med students, premed students, and DVM students) GET THIS KIT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Suture Set
customer_reviews.text: Value product for my daughter who is seeking to enter nursing school. Good practice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Auggie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Wait, am I doctor now?
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit so much! It has everything you need to learn to suture and it’s all in a handy little carry case! The quality of the material is great, just like in a hospital! This kit gives you everything you need to become proficient in suturing.
customer_reviews.author: RMP

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with better quality suture. Other than that it a ok product.
customer_reviews.author: Nyjia Turnbow

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Good kit for start on suture procedures it's all there E- book plus tools would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: joseph hansen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thanks
customer_reviews.text: I received it today, I loved it thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kit
customer_reviews.text: Totally stoked! Everything thing one needs to practice and become proficient at their sutre techniques.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Nakagawa

customer_reviews.title: Suturing course
customer_reviews.text: Good product.......good value. The materials are excellent and it is definitely a "complete" kit. I have 2 dislikes..........1 the videos could be a little longer and #2 would be that they do not show "hand" tying of the knots only instrument tying.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bonham

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good practice kit. Quality is very good and overall it was a very good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Finstein

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for medical students who want to practice suturing! Not only is the kit equipped with all of the materials needed for beginners but it also comes with guided video tutorials! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Maisuria

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful. The price you can not beat . Instrument are good quality
customer_reviews.author: Katrinatoler

customer_reviews.title: Very neat and useable item.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 13 yr old Daughter who wants to be a doctor. She takes it everywhere with us. She has improved alot since getting it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I am an FNP student trying to practice my skills more and this product is amazing! The quality is astounding for the price! Can’t go wrong :)
customer_reviews.author: jillian Diekman

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Suture Practice Kit!
customer_reviews.text: The kit was shipped quickly to my house and was in great condition! Everything that came within this kit is great quality! I started suturing simple interrupted sutures and the pad is holding up really good and felt like it was skin like material! I also loved the carryall leather case. It is really nice! Highly recommend this suture kit!!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: How to use the tools
customer_reviews.text: I like how real the material fealt like skin. The tools were not cheap, good quality. Was used for getting accumulated w/ my career path. I wish there was a how to video or cd to accompany it
customer_reviews.author: Monica Moorman

customer_reviews.title: What is the most important thing to know?
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is really good, it has everything needed to practice different technique of suture. I recommended for medical students who will like to improve medical skills.
customer_reviews.author: Hayron

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit
customer_reviews.text: Licensed veterinary nurse excited to learn new suture skills. Very nice suture kit.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena V. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Just got my suture kit today, opened it and it’s wonderful, I really can’t wait to use it and get better in my suturing skills..Thumbs up to you guys for this wonderful kit❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Toluwani Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Quality Kit
customer_reviews.text: I saw great reviews about this kit and decided to try it. Thus far, I have no complaints. Communication with the seller is fast and easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Polo D

customer_reviews.title: Convenient. User-friendly. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The suture pad is quite human-like and instruments are in good condition. I recommend this for any one who wishes to practice and perfect the art of suturing.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: A Great Way to Learn
customer_reviews.text: The kit was for my granddaughter, a surgeon training, at least this point. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Bill M.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! It has everything you need and the practice pads are realistic and durable. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is great for newbies who want to know how to suture. I bought it to learn and even my 80 year old father thinks it's pretty neat. You won't be sorry you got it.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the silicone pad because it keeps the pad stable and therefore easier to practice suturing. Will definitely buy this again👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Will use for practicing suturing. It is a good beginner set.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great service!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Has everything I need to enhance my suturing skills. Plus it was delivered to my house within just a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Korry Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Received as expected. Love the zippered case to keep it in.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even throw a nylon stitch without it ripping through the pad. Not happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Riesenberg

customer_reviews.title: You will love to train with this perfect suture Training kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality , fast and secure delivery , love it to train with this suture practite kit ! , 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M

customer_reviews.title: Presentation is professional
customer_reviews.text: Instruments come in a nice case and they are good quality to be just for the purpose of education.
customer_reviews.author: Enid Morales

customer_reviews.title: Available e-book that comes with product not accessible
customer_reviews.text: The kit is great and has everything needed to practice suturing but the e-book is not available.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The whole package
customer_reviews.text: Great learning hands on product. With free online access video guides. Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, this will help me learn to suture in the comfort of my house. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Alethea Scherer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery. The kit is of great quality. I recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: J. Tapanes

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Everything advertised came just as posted I am very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kahmalia-Kalee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: Great product for training! Everything you need to practice wound closures.
customer_reviews.author: Adam LeCroy

customer_reviews.title: Great For Practice
customer_reviews.text: Any future doctor should definitely use this kit. Great practice!
customer_reviews.author: Hailee Hall

customer_reviews.title: Find another suture kit.
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good suturing kit, at all. The forceps, have huge teeth, the needle holder is of poor quality and doesn’t hold or control the grip on the needle, the needle spins on the needle holder. The suture needles are rather small. The Pad, most important, rips very easily and the precut incisions, are not deep enough to do a deep tissue layer, like you would do in an ortho closure. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.  Good Quality and nice compact carrying case.  Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very interested in medicine and she wanted to learn to suture. This was a gift. It is exactly what she wanted. More links to helpful videos would have been great to have.
customer_reviews.author: dh

product_meta.title: Complete Suture Practice Kit for Medical Students w/ How-To Suture HD Video Course, Suture Training Manual & Carryall Case. All-in-One A Plus Medics kit incl. suture practice pad. (Education Use Only)
product_meta.description:
Medical students say our suture practice kit has given them real-world confidence.
Unlike cheap suture training kits with flimsy tools, thin materials, or cheap instructions, our 26-piece suture practice kit gives you everything you need to gain confidence fast - including our up-close, HD video suture training video course...

HD Video Course
Our step-by-step videos give you the fastest path to learn how to suture fast so you can gain confidence and develop a steady hand. You'll go close-up with an experienced professional - all in HD detail. You'll learn how to suture with ease and precision for:
Simple Interrupted
Mattress Sutures
Simple Running
Subcuticular
And more

Skid-Stop, 3-Layer Suture Practice Pad
Medical students say they notice the quality at first touch.

Our 3-layer design gives you the feel of skin, fat, and muscle, with a mesh reinforced design that stands up to multiple uses. 

Our Skid-Stop base design with the six rubber feet keeps your suturing board in place while suturing for realistic hassle-free training experience without slipping or sliding.

Various Types of Threads, Solid Instruments, and a Carryall Case
Get the extra edge by getting various types of threads to familiarize yourself with different suture materials! Your suture practice kit comes packed with 16 threads of various types. 

Students say our tools feel good in the hand. Best of all, everything packs into the carryall case - even the suturing board - so you can take your suture practice kit anywhere easily with you!

But don’t take our word for it…

Open your suture practice kit, feel the suture practice pad texture, the weight of the tools, and watch the HD Videos for yourself. Then, see how easy it is to develop a steady hand and gain that real-world confidence fast so you can throw stitches when needed.
feature_bullets: SUTURE PRACTICE KIT TO GAIN CONFIDENCE FAST: Medical Students say they love how our suture training kit comes with a full set of essential tools, and how everything packs away in our carryall case that even holds the suturing board (unlike cheaper options).

HD SUTURE TRAINING VIDEOS: Our team at A Plus Medics worked hard to bring you the most complete suture training available; we’ve produced a close-up HD video training series with an experienced professional who takes you step-by-step to help you learn how to suture with ease and precision.

3-LAYER SUTURING BOARD W/ SKID STOP: Our Skid-Stop design ends the frustration of slipping and sliding, while our unique 3-layer mesh reinforced suture practice pad gives you simulated Muscle, Fat and lacerated Skin layers for realistic training; You’ll enjoy a suturing board texture that stands up to multiple uses.

16 SUTURE THREADS: Whether you need to practice continuous, interrupted, mattress or subcuticular stitches, our suture practice kit gives you 16 packs of Nylon, Polypropylene, Silk & Polyester sutures - You’ll quickly develop a steady hand and gain confidence in no time!

EASY-TO-USE INSTRUMENTS: No cheap tools here - Unlike other Suture training kits, you get 5 suture tools that are durable, and feel solid in the hand; but don’t take our word for it. Open up the A Plus Medics kit for yourself - you’ll see how easy it is to gain real-world confidence fast.
